Several CSS (styling) fixes around the Roblox website

description.$message:
List of fixes applied:
- Pending, blocked, or moderated thumbnails in most places will now always match your website theme
- The X button on the prompt for push notifications will be properly visible for your website theme
- Experience tooltips will no longer overrun outside of the tooltip box
- The layout of the Included Items list in Bundles will stay more consistent
- Newlines will work in item descriptions
- The pagination of the "Currently Wearing" section will work consistently on Desktop
- The border above the Hosted By field on Experience events now has a visible color on Light theme
- Favorites button is now always right under the thumbnail on item pages
- Modernizes 3D, 2D, Try-On, Portrait/Avatar switch/Download 3D Avatar buttons
- Adds padding between the "Your Privacy Choices" text and verified symbol
- Carousel controls for experience media are now more visible after the colors update
- Connection popovers now have consistent thumbnail size for the currently playing experience

description.$message: Experiments can be unreleased Roblox features that may not work correctly. They may affect your account and/or break extensions.

acLogoutModal.$context: Logout modal when using Roblox's logout button while Accounts Manager is enabled

body.$message:
By using Roblox's default logout button, you will <bold>invalidate the current session.</bold>

You will not be able to login to this account with Accounts Manager without going through Roblox's login page again.

To logout without invalidating the session, open Accounts Manager and click "Logout".

creatorAllowWarning.$context: Warning shown when trying to allow a creator from the context menu on their page

body.$message:
Having at least one allowed creator has some performance impact on loading experiences on the Home and Charts page.

You can always unallow creators later in <settingsLink>RoSeal Settings</settingsLink>.

creatorBlockWarning.$context: Warning shown when trying to block a user from the context menu on their page

body.$message:
Having at least one blocked creator has some performance impact on loading experiences on the Home and Charts page.

You can always unblock creators later in <settingsLink>RoSeal Settings</settingsLink>.
